trans-unit.source: Enables access to ASP.NET forms authentication as a Web service.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar åtkomst till ASP.NET-formulärautentisering som en webbtjänst.

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationService object enables you to authenticate users through a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: Objektet AuthenticationService gör att du kan autentisera användare via ett [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service.

trans-unit.source: You use the WCF authentication service when you must authenticate users through ASP.NET membership from an application that is outside the Web application that stores the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Du använder tjänsten WCF-autentisering när du måste autentisera användare via ASP.NET-medlemskap från ett program som är utanför webbprogrammet som lagrar användarens autentiseringsuppgifter.

trans-unit.source: The application must be able to send and consume message in the SOAP format.
trans-unit.target: Programmet måste kunna skicka och använda meddelandet i SOAP-format.

trans-unit.source: Through the AuthenticationService class, you can log users in, log users out, validate credentials, check authentication status, customize authentication, and set the authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Via klassen AuthenticationService du användare logga in, användare loggas, verifiera autentiseringsuppgifterna, kontrollera autentiseringsstatus för, anpassa autentisering och ange autentiseringscookien.

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationService class contains four methods that you should access only through a WCF service: the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.IsLoggedIn%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Logout%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AuthenticationService innehåller fyra metoder som du ska komma åt endast via en WCF-tjänst: den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.IsLoggedIn%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Logout%2A>, och <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Logout%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.IsLoggedIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: To call these methods, you enable the authentication service on a Web server and then connect a WCF-compatible client application to the Web service.
trans-unit.target: För att anropa metoderna, aktivera Autentiseringstjänsten på en webbserver och anslut sedan ett klientprogram i WCF-kompatibel till webbtjänsten.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure the authentication service, see [How to: Enable the WCF Authentication Service](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Information om hur du konfigurerar Autentiseringstjänsten finns [så här: aktivera WCF-Autentiseringstjänsten](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To log users on, you pass the user credentials to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För inloggning av användare som du skickar autentiseringsuppgifter för den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the credentials are valid, the AuthenticationService class creates an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Om autentiseringsuppgifterna är giltiga, skapas en autentiseringscookie AuthenticationService-klassen.

trans-unit.source: If the authentication cookie has not expired, you know that the user's credentials have been authenticated and you do not have to validate the credentials again.
trans-unit.target: Om cookien för autentisering inte har upphört att gälla, vet du att användarens autentiseringsuppgifter har autentiserats och du behöver inte verifiera autentiseringsuppgifterna igen.

trans-unit.source: (Cookie-less authentication is not available through the AuthenticationService class.) The AuthenticationService can raise two events: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>.
trans-unit.target: (Cookie mindre autentisering är inte tillgängliga via klassen AuthenticationService.) AuthenticationService kan medföra två händelser: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>och <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event occurs when the user credentials are being validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelsen inträffar när användarens autentiseringsuppgifter verifieras.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event to customize how user credentials are validated.
trans-unit.target: Skapa en händelsehanterare för den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelsen för att anpassa hur autentiseringsuppgifter valideras.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event occurs when the authentication cookie is being set after user credentials have been validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>händelsen inträffar när autentiseringscookien anges när autentiseringsuppgifter har verifierats.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event to customize the authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Skapa en händelsehanterare för den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>händelsen för att anpassa autentiseringscookien.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A> method checks user credentials for authentication, but it does not return an authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A>metoden kontrollerar användarautentiseringsuppgifter för autentisering, men returnerar inte en autentiseringsbiljett.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A> when a user has previously logged in and you must check that the credentials are still valid at the start of a new application session.
trans-unit.target: Använd <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A>när en användare har loggade in och du måste kontrollera att autentiseringsuppgifterna är giltiga i början av en ny session för programmet.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the WCF authentication service from a console application, see [Walkthrough: Using ASP.NET Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel på hur WCF-tjänst från ett konsolprogram för autentisering, se [genomgång: med ASP.NET-programtjänster](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when user credentials are being validated.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när användarautentiseringsuppgifter valideras.

trans-unit.source: The Authenticating event is raised when user credentials are being validated.
trans-unit.target: Authenticating-händelsen utlöses när användarautentiseringsuppgifter valideras.

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler for the Authenticating event to customize how user credentials are validated.
trans-unit.target: Skapa en händelsehanterare för händelsen Authenticating för att anpassa hur autentiseringsuppgifter verifieras.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the authentication cookie is being set.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när autentiseringscookien anges.

trans-unit.source: The CreatingCookie event is raised when the authentication cookie is being set after user credentials have been validated.
trans-unit.target: CreatingCookie-händelsen utlöses när autentiseringscookien anges när autentiseringsuppgifter har verifierats.

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler for the CreatingCookie event to customize the authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Skapa en händelsehanterare för händelsen CreatingCookie för att anpassa autentiseringscookien.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Anger om den aktuella användaren har autentiserats.

trans-unit.source: The IsLoggedIn method checks whether the current user is authenticated by checking the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity.IsAuthenticated%2A>.property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IsLoggedIn kontrollerar om den aktuella användaren autentiseras genom att kontrollera den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity.IsAuthenticated%2A>.property.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity.IsAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not call the IsLoggedIn method from code that is executing on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inte anropa metoden IsLoggedIn från kod som körs på webbservern.

trans-unit.source: You call the IsLoggedIn method only as part of a WCF service.
trans-unit.target: Du anropa metoden IsLoggedIn endast som en del av en WCF-tjänst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user has been authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om användaren har autentiserats; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Checks user credentials and creates an authentication ticket (cookie) if the credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerar användarens autentiseringsuppgifter och skapar en autentiseringsbiljett (cookie) om autentiseringsuppgifterna är giltiga.

trans-unit.source: The Login method validates user credentials through a membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Metoden inloggningen verifierar autentiseringsuppgifter för användare via en medlemskapsprovider.

trans-unit.source: You can use the default membership provider or specify a custom membership provider at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda standardprovider för medlemskap eller ange en anpassad medlemskapsprovider vid körning.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class passes `userName` and `password` to the membership provider's <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method, but does not pass `customCredential`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen överför `userName` och `password` till medlemskapsprovidern <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>metoden, men inte klarar `customCredential`.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> returns `true`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> creates an authentication ticket as a cookie.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>returnerar `true`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>skapar en autentiseringsbiljett som en cookie.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the `isPersistent` parameter to `true` to create an authentication ticket that lasts beyond the current session.
trans-unit.target: Ange den `isPersistent` parameter till `true` att skapa en autentiseringsbiljett varar utanför den aktuella sessionen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always use the authentication service together with the secure sockets layer (SSL, by using HTTPS) to protect sensitive data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid använda Autentiseringstjänsten tillsammans med secure sockets layer (SSL med hjälp av HTTPS) att skydda känsliga data.

trans-unit.source: The Login method raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event and the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden inloggningen genererar den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelse och <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>händelse.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler for <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> to customize authentication, such as checking the values in `customCredential` or validating credentials through a non-default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Skapa en händelsehanterare för <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>att anpassa autentisering, till exempel Kontrollera värdena `customCredential` eller validering av autentiseringsuppgifter via en icke-förvalt medlemskapsprovider.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The values in `customCredential` are not validated by the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Värdena i `customCredential` verifieras inte av standardprovider för medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: To customize the authentication cookie, create an event handler for <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill anpassa cookien för autentisering, skapar du en händelsehanterare för <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not call the Login method from code that is executing on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inte anropa metoden inloggningen från kod som körs på webbservern.

trans-unit.source: You call the Login method only as part of a WCF service.
trans-unit.target: Du anropa metoden inloggning endast som en del av en WCF-tjänst.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [ASP.NET-autentisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The user name to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Användarnamn som ska verifieras.

trans-unit.source: The password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: Lösenordet för den angivna användaren.

trans-unit.source: The value or values to validate in addition to `userName` and `password`, if any.
trans-unit.target: Värden för att verifiera förutom `userName` och `password`, om sådana finns.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the authentication ticket remains valid across sessions.
trans-unit.target: Ett värde som anger om autentiseringsbiljetten förblir giltig mellan sessioner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if user credentials are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om användarens autentiseringsuppgifter är giltiga. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: userName or password is .
trans-unit.target: userNameor password is .

trans-unit.source: Clears the authentication ticket (cookie) in the browser.
trans-unit.target: Rensar autentiseringsbiljetten (cookie) i webbläsaren.

trans-unit.source: The Logout method clears the authentication cookie from the browser's cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: Metoden logga ut raderar autentiseringscookien från webbläsarens cookie-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The user must log in again to be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Användaren måste logga in igen ska autentiseras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not store information on the server about which authentication tickets have been cleared.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen inte lagra informationen på servern om vilken autentiseringsmetod biljetter har avmarkerats.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not call the Logout method from code that is executing on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inte anropa metoden logga ut från kod som körs på webbservern.

trans-unit.source: You call the Logout method only as part of a WCF service.
trans-unit.target: Du anropa metoden logga ut som en del av en WCF-tjänst.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [ASP.NET-autentisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Authenticates user credentials without issuing an authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: Verifierar autentiseringsuppgifter för användare utan att utfärda en autentiseringsbiljett.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateUser method authenticates the user credentials but does not set an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateUser autentiserar autentiseringsuppgifter, men anger inte en autentiseringscookie.

trans-unit.source: Without an authentication cookie, the user will not be logged in even if the credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Utan en autentiseringscookie loggas användaren inte även om autentiseringsuppgifterna är giltiga.

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidateUser method when you must check whether a user's credentials are valid without receiving an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Använd ValidateUser-metoden när du måste kontrollera om en användares autentiseringsuppgifter är giltiga utan att få en autentiseringscookie.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might do this if the authentication cookie is already stored in a client application but you want to verify that the user's credentials are still valid when a new session starts.
trans-unit.target: Du kan till exempel göra detta om autentiseringscookien lagras redan i ett klientprogram, men du vill kontrollera att användarens autentiseringsuppgifter är giltiga när en ny session startar.

trans-unit.source: TheValidateUser method raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event, but does not raise the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event.
trans-unit.target: TheValidateUser metoden genererar den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>händelse, men inte öka den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>händelse.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not call the ValidateUser method from code that is executing on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inte anropa metoden ValidateUser från kod som körs på webbservern.

trans-unit.source: You call the ValidateUser method only as part of a WCF service.
trans-unit.target: Du anropa metoden ValidateUser endast som en del av en WCF-tjänst.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [ASP.NET-autentisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The user name to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Användarnamn som ska verifieras.

trans-unit.source: The password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: Lösenordet för den angivna användaren.

trans-unit.source: The value or values to validate in addition to `userName` and `password`, if any.
trans-unit.target: Värden för att verifiera förutom `userName` och `password`, om sådana finns.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om användarens autentiseringsuppgifter är giltiga. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: userName or password is .
trans-unit.target: userNameor password is .
